Name: Slipstream Wyvern
Effect: Invoke: Until the end of the next turn, reduce the cost of the next Slipstream Drake you play by 1.

Name: Slipstream Drake
Effect: Invoke: Until the end of the next turn, reduce the cost of the next Slipstream Dragoon you play by 1.

Name: Slipstream Dragoon
Effect: Invoke: If "Slipstream Wyvern" and "Slipstream Drake" are in your Gauge, this Breaker gains +3 Power.

Name: Miracle Egg
Effect: Hand: [EB3, Discard this card and a Breaker with 7 or more Power from your hand] Gauge Charge 1. You can only use the effect of "Miracle Egg" once per turn.

Name: Moonlight Dragon
Effect: Invoke: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, add a Breaker from amoungst them to your Gauge. Shuffle the rest into your deck.

Name: Blitz Strike Dragon
Effect: Const: This card's entire cost may be payed for with one Dragon-type Breaker in your Gauge with 7 or more Power.

Name: Ace Dragonute
Effect: Hand: [Remove this card from the game] Your opponent's Active Breaker becomes Zer0ed. Gain 1 EP.

Name: Omniflare Dragon
Effect: Modifier: This Breaker gains +1 Power for each Breaker with 7 or more Power used to pay for this card's cost. Invoke: If this card's Power is 12 or higher, discard a Breaker in the opposing Gauge.

Name: Backdraft Wyvern
Effect: Victory Cry: Search your deck for a Dragon-type Breaker with 7 or more Power and add it to your hand.

Name: Savage Fang
Effect: Modifier: If you put a Breaker in your Gauge by card effect during your last turn, this card has [Striker +1].

Name: Enigmatic Egg
Effect: Debris: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. [Discard this card] Add a Breaker with 5 or more Power from amoungst them to your hand then shuffle the rest into your deck.

Name: Surge Falcon
Effect: Trigger: [EB2] After this card is discarded as cost to play a Breaker with 7 or more Power, give that Breaker +1 Power.

Name: Flame Imp
Effect: Invoke: [Gauge Break 1 & add a Breaker in your hand to the bottom of your Gauge] Draw 1.

Name: Dragon Tamer
Effect: Invoke: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. [EB3] Add a Dragon-Type Breaker from amoungst them to your hand then shuffle the rest into your deck.
